about_us.title: About us
about_us.text:
The Blue Cross helps individuals with addiction, supports their family members, and advocates for effective youth protection in dealing with alcohol consumption. Through targeted youth protection measures, the Blue Cross assists the federal and cantonal governments in fulfilling their legal mandates. Prevention and health promotion are important components of its activities, including, for example, test purchases of alcoholic beverages. 

 The ID Scan App supports sales personnel in complying with youth protection regulations in the sale of alcohol. It was developed jointly by the Federal Office for Customs and Border Security (FOCBS) and the Blue Cross Switzerland.

data_protection.title: Data protection
data_protection.text:
No data is recorded when using the ID Scan app. The scanner only reads the ID and does not take a photo. The application can also be used without an internet connection, even in flight mode.
